mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id , m.nickname , m.profile_image_url FROM friend as f JOIN member m ON (m.member_id = f.requester_id AND f.requester_id = #{ memberId }) OR (m.member_id = f.addressee_id AND f.addressee_id = #{ memberId }) WHERE f.status_id = ( SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_type = 'ACCEPTED' )

SELECT f.requester_id , m.nickname , m.profile_image_url FROM friend f JOIN member m ON f.requester_id = m.member_id WHERE f.addressee_id = #{ addresseeId } AND f.status_id = ( SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_type = 'PENDING' )
